column1: I use this product every night. Helps keep my skin moisturized and wrinkle free [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love this product. I started seeing results immediately on my face and neck, I moisturize in the morning under make up, then at night again. Pleasant smell as well. I would recommend to a friend.

Great product...I been using it for about a week and since the second day a feel my skin diferent for good. It feels my skin soft and radiant. Not a greasy or elastic feeling at all. I definitely recomend it.
